# Map Indicator

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/map-indicator>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:39:50.703877

---

A device you can use to place an icon on both your island (visible in overview) and the island [minimap](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#minimap). The indicator is used to mark a specific location, such as an objective, or a rallying point.
